name: Abdul-Aziz Muhtaram
story: Abbas grew up in a small village in Iran. He was trained in marksmanship by his father, who was a skilled hunter. As a young man, Abbas joined the Iranian military and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional skills with a rifle. Eventually, Abbas was recruited by the OPFOR to serve as a marksman in their operations. He is known for his strategic thinking and accurate shooting.
